name: zeroDAO
introduce: Zero DAO protocol is a p2p signaling service and suite of blockchain software which facilitates quick transfers of value across blockchains and can run arbitrary code upon the transfer. The protocol contains facilities for fast execution by means of a short term lending system where the value of incoming assets are made available to the module handling them, and the loan is repaid when the mediator (RenVM) releases it directly back to the system.
